newsitem.title: GREECE: EVERT STRIKES BACK WITH SNAP PRESSER AT ZAPPEION.
newsitem.headline: EVERT STRIKES BACK WITH SNAP PRESSER AT ZAPPEION.

text.p: Conservative New Democracy party leader Miltiadis Evert will hold a snap news conference at 1900 local at Zappeion Hall to rebut comments on farmers, pensioners and small businesses by socialist Prime Minister Costas Simitis.
Simitis told reporters objective criteria would be abolished sometime within the next four years once the computerisation of the finance ministry was completed.
Evert has called for the immediate abolition of the criteria within 30 days if he wins the snap polls on September 22. --George Georgiopoulos, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
